main.name: Inda Gvozdjar
main.description: I am very ambitious and friendly person ready to devote my time for learning and making impact from this side of machine
main.bio: I am a very reliable self-taught front-end(for now) developer. I concider myself to be excellent with people and I actually love working in teams. I don't have any issue with working in office or remote as long as I get the task i am sure i can deal with it. Beside developing skills, which I would try to demonstrate for you on this page I have also big passion for ArtÂ¸so I will try to combine those two. I love music, drawing, creating new clothes etc. I will try to make this fun Portfolio and to show you a peek in to my World. Enjoy!
main.contactmessage: I would love to become a part of really good team, becoming first a friend with all of them and the best bussines partner!

resume.skillmessage: I am currently working in JavaScript React but I am always ready to learn as much as possible.

education.description: After i enrolled in third year I started upgrading my dev skills and now I am sure I have more than enough skills to satisfy the position of junior developer

project.description: These are few of my excercise projects.They are mostly boilerplate projects that I was working on just for practice, I do not feel that they are accurate representation of the quality of my work but it will give you a sense of tehnologies that i work with. However, I am more then happy to create a sample web application project to show case my dev skills.

testimonials.text: That Inda Gvozdjar must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired her yet. Hey you, you should hire this girl, she may not yet finisshed University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that she will be one of your best developers in no time!
